content:
Luke/Brian/I talked a good deal after the wit-component meeting today and I wrote up notes at https://github.com/WebAssembly/component-model/issues/140 -- happy to continue discussion there or here if others have thoughts, it's by no means final and just what we're thinking so far

Adding a `use` directive to `*.wit` 路 Issue #140 路 WebAssembly/component-model
Currently as specified the *.wit format doesn't have a use directive or any similar ability to import/share definitions from other files. A historical implementation of this existed in wit-bind...
